Command.Description: Disable Power over CoaXPress (PoCXP) for the Link.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PoCxpOnOffKnife
IntSwissKnife.Formula: (SEL_CH=0) ? V_POCXP0 : ((SEL_CH=1) ? V_POCXP1 : ((SEL_CH=2) ? V_POCXP2 : ((SEL_CH=3) ? V_POCXP3 : ((SEL_CH=4) ? V_POCXP4 : ((SEL_CH=5) ? V_POCXP5 : ((SEL_CH=6) ? V_POCXP6 : ((SEL_CH=7) ? V_POCXP7 : V_POCXPALL)))))))

Command.Description: Removes specified range from watch.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical pin of the external camera connectors.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical pin of the external camera connectors.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineEventMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the line event generation mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the line event generation mode.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of each of the User Output register.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of each of the User Output register.

Integer.Name: UserOutputValueAll
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register. It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask.
Integer.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register. It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask.

Integer.Name: UserOutputValueAllMask
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the write mask to apply to the value specified by UserOutputValueAll before writing it in the User Output register.
Integer.Description: Sets the write mask to apply to the value specified by UserOutputValueAll before writing it in the User Output register. If the UserOutputValueAllMask feature is present, setting the user Output register using UserOutputValueAll will only change the bits that have a corresponding bit in the mask set to one.

Integer.Name: CameraTriggerSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the type of camera trigger to configure.
Integer.Description: Selects the type of camera trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: CameraTriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected camera trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected camera trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: CameraTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the camera trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the camera trigger.

Enumeration.Name: CameraTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the camera trigger source. The selected camera trigger must have its CameraTriggerMode set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the camera trigger source. The selected camera trigger must have its CameraTriggerMode set to On.

Integer.Name: CameraTriggerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the camera trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the camera trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: CameraTriggerFilter
Float.ToolTip: Filter for camera trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Filter for camera trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).

Command.Name: CameraTriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal camera trigger. CameraTriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal camera trigger. CameraTriggerSource must be set to Software.

IntReg.Name: CameraTriggerSoftwareReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Issue the Camera Trigger Software command.

Enumeration.Name: CameraTriggerEventEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable event from camera trigger on every activation.
Enumeration.Description: Enable event from camera trigger on every activation.

StringReg.Name: CameraManifestFilePath
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the File Path to the GenICam XML camera description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the File Path to the GenICam XML camera description file.

Enumeration.Name: ManualCameraMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if to activate the manual camera configuration mode.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if to activate the manual camera configuration mode.

Enumeration.Name: ManualCameraConnectionConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: Manual Camera Connection Config
Enumeration.Description: Manual Camera Connection Config

Enumeration.Name: ManualCameraChannelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the camera channel for which to configure the physical Frame Grabber connection link.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the camera channel for which to configure the physical Frame Grabber connection link.

Integer.Name: ManualCameraFGLink
Integer.ToolTip: Physical Frame Grabber link index.
Integer.Description: Physical Frame Grabber link index.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: This provides the control packet data size.
Integer.Description: This provides the control packet data size.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: This provides the stream packet data size.
Integer.Description: This provides the stream packet data size.

Integer.ToolTip: This gives the Stream ID of the primary image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: This gives the Stream ID of the primary image stream from the Device.

Integer.Name: Image2StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: This gives the Stream ID of the secondary image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: This gives the Stream ID of the secondary image stream from the Device.

Boolean.Name: ImageAcquisitionFilterEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables condition filter, under which the image was acquired.
Boolean.Description: Enables condition filter, under which the image was acquired.

Integer.Name: ImageAcquisitionFilterSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Condition filter selector, under which the image was acquired.
Integer.Description: Condition filter selector, under which the image was acquired.

Enumeration.Name: ImageAcquisitionFilterValue
Enumeration.ToolTip: Rule for image acquisition, under condition filter selected by "ImageAcquisitionFilterSelector".
Enumeration.Description: Rule for image acquisition, under condition filter selected by "ImageAcquisitionFilterSelector".

Command.Description: Reset all transport counters.

Integer.Name: RevisionPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Revision packets.
Integer.Description: Number of Revision packets.

Integer.Name: CommandPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Command packets.
Integer.Description: Number of Command packets.

Integer.Name: PRBS_Errors

Integer.ToolTip: Number of corrected packets by FEC.
Integer.Description: Number of corrected packets by FEC.

Integer.Name: FEC_CorruptedPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of uncorrectable packets.
Integer.Description: Number of uncorrectable packets.

Enumeration.Name: StreamDuplicationChannel0
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable Stream Duplication mode for channel 0.
Enumeration.Description: Enable Stream Duplication mode for channel 0.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects device available serial port.
Enumeration.Description: Selects device available serial port.

Boolean.Name: DeviceSerialPortComEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables selected serial COM port channel.
Boolean.Description: Enables selected serial COM port channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceSerialPortNumber
Integer.ToolTip: Serial virtual COM port number.
Integer.Description: Serial virtual COM port number.

Integer.Name: TriggerSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Integer.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerEventMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the trigger event generation mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the trigger event generation mode.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Integer.Name: TriggerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: TriggerFilter
Float.ToolTip: Filter for trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Filter for trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the number of frames to acquire for each stream acquisition trigger.
Integer.Description: Specifies the number of frames to acquire for each stream acquisition trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Timer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

Float.Name: TimerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.
Float.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.

Float.Name: TimerDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the Timer pulse.
Float.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds(us) of the Timer pulse.

Enumeration.Name: TimerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.

Boolean.Name: TimerOutputInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the timer output signal.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the timer output signal.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

Command.Name: TimerTriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger . TimerTriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TimerTriggerSource must be set to Software.

IntReg.Name: TimerTriggerSoftwareReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Issue the Trigger Software command to Timer.

Command.Name: TimerReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TimerEventMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Counter.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Encoder to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Encoder to configure.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderOutputMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects Encoder Output signal behaviour.
Enumeration.Description: Selects Encoder Output signal behaviour.

Boolean.Name: EncoderInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected Encoder.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected Encoder.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderASource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Encoder source selection for A input.
Enumeration.Description: Encoder source selection for A input.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderBSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Encoder source selection for B input.
Enumeration.Description: Encoder source selection for B input.

Integer.Name: EncoderValue
Integer.ToolTip: Encoder value in step counts. Writing this register will pre-set the count.
Integer.Description: Encoder value in step counts. Writing this register will pre-set the count.

Integer.Name: EncoderPositionTrigger
Integer.ToolTip: The value to compare with the Encoder Position Value, if position trigger is selected.
Integer.Description: The value to compare with the Encoder Position Value, if position trigger is selected.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderResetSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Encoder source selection for reset input.
Enumeration.Description: Encoder source selection for reset input.

Float.Name: EncoderFilter
Float.ToolTip: Filter for encoder, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Filter for encoder, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).

Enumeration.Name: EncoderResetActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Activation mode of the Encoder Reset Source signal.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Activation mode of the Encoder Reset Source signal.

Command.Name: EncoderReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Encoder and starts it. The Encoder starts counting events immediately after the reset.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Encoder and starts it. The Encoder starts counting events immediately after the reset.

Integer.Name: EncoderValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the of the position counter of the selected Encoder when it was reset by a signal or by an explicit EncoderReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the of the position counter of the selected Encoder when it was reset by a signal or by an explicit EncoderReset command.

Enumeration.Name: EncoderEventEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable Disable event from encoder.
Enumeration.Description: Enable or disable event from encoder.

Enumeration.Name: PulseMessageMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Pulse Message operation mode.
Enumeration.Description: Pulse Message operation mode.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message configuration set selector.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message configuration set selector.

Enumeration.Name: PulseMessageEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected PulseMessage trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected PulseMessage trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: PulseMessageActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the PulseMessage trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the PulseMessage trigger.

Enumeration.Name: PulseMessageSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the camera trigger source. The selected camera trigger must have its PulseMessageEnable set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the camera trigger source. The selected camera trigger must have its PulseMessageEnable set to On.

Float.Name: PulseMessageDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the PulseMessage trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds(us) to apply after the PulseMessage trigger reception before activating it.

Float.Name: PulseMessageFilter
Float.ToolTip: Filter for PulseMessage trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Filter for PulseMessage trigger, helps prevent signal de-bouncing. 8ns resolution, units in microseconds(us).

Command.Name: PulseMessageSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal camera trigger. PulseMessageSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal camera trigger. PulseMessageSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: PulseMessagePulseMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects Pulse Mode of generated Pulse Message.
Enumeration.Description: Selects Pulse Mode of generated Pulse Message.

Enumeration.Description: Pulse message color select definition.

Integer.Name: PulseMessagePulseEffect
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message effect intended for synchronous frame by frame control of camera features.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message effect intended for synchronous frame by frame control of camera features.

Boolean.Name: PulseMessageSyncRequest
Boolean.ToolTip: Request for reset to an initial frame or line count and agree on the identification of the image data for parallel processing applications.
Boolean.Description: Request for reset to an initial frame or line count and agree on the identification of the image data for parallel processing applications.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageLinkMaskEnable
Integer.ToolTip: Physical link mask target of Pulse Message generation.
Integer.Description: Physical link mask target of Pulse Message generation.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageFramePeriod
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message frame period down counter definition.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message frame period down counter definition.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageIntegrationStartRed
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message Red channel integration period down counter definition.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message Red channel integration period down counter definition.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageIntegrationStartGreen
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message Green channel integration period down counter definition.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message Green channel integration period down counter definition.

Integer.Name: PulseMessageIntegrationStartBlue
Integer.ToolTip: Pulse Message Blue channel integration period down counter definition.
Integer.Description: Pulse Message Blue channel integration period down counter definition.

Float.Name: FirmwareVersion
Float.Description: Firmware version of the device.

String.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
String.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
String.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

String.Name: DeviceFirmwareStatus
String.ToolTip: Status of the firmware in the device.
String.Description: Status of the firmware in the device.

Command.Name: DeviceUserIDWrite
Command.Description: Writes 'Device User ID' to hardware

Integer.Name: SerialNumber
Integer.ToolTip: Serial Number of the device.
Integer.Description: Serial Number of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceRevision
Integer.ToolTip: Revision of the device.
Integer.Description: Revision of the device.

Integer.Name: MaxLinks
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum available links on the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum available links on the device.

Integer.Name: DevicePhysicalLinksMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum physical links available on the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum physical links available on the device.

Integer.Name: DevicePciGeneration
Integer.ToolTip: PCIe generation configuration.
Integer.Description: PCIe generation configuration.

Integer.Name: DevicePciGenerationMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimal device requirement for PCIe generation.
Integer.Description: Minimal device requirement for PCIe generation.

Integer.Name: DevicePciLanes
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum available lanes on the device PCIe slot.
Integer.Description: Maximum available lanes on the device PCIe slot.

Integer.Name: DevicePciLanesMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimal device requirement for number of PCI lanes.
Integer.Description: Minimal device requirement for number of PCI lanes.

Integer.Name: DeviceTemperature
Integer.ToolTip: Device core temperature in Celsius.
Integer.Description: Device core temperature in Celsius.

Integer.Name: MaxCameras
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum available cameras which are supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum available cameras which are supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTemperatureExitWarningThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Device core temperature exit warning threshold in Celsius.
Integer.Description: Device core temperature exit warning threshold in Celsius.

Integer.Name: DeviceTemperatureWarningThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Device core temperature warning threshold in Celsius.
Integer.Description: Device core temperature warning threshold in Celsius.

Integer.Name: DeviceTemperatureExitCriticalThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Device core temperature exit critical threshold in Celsius.
Integer.Description: Device core temperature exit critical threshold in Celsius.

Integer.Name: DeviceTemperatureCriticalThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: Device core temperature critical threshold in Celsius.
Integer.Description: Device core temperature critical threshold in Celsius.

Integer.Name: CameraSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Appoint camera index, for Frame Grabber's per camera related features modification.
Integer.Description: Appoint camera index, for Frame Grabber's per camera related features modification.

Enumeration.Name: CameraChannelState
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicator on frame grabber state on specific camera channel.
Enumeration.Description: Indicator on frame grabber state on specific camera channel.

Integer.Name: CameraMasterLink
Integer.ToolTip: Camera master link.
Integer.Description: Camera master link.

Command.Name: StatisticsCountersReset
Command.Description: Reset all statistics counters.

Integer.Name: CRCErrorCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Camera CRC Error Counter. Number of CRC errors generated from corrupted data packets.
Integer.Description: Camera CRC Error Counter. Number of CRC errors generated from corrupted data packets.

Integer.Name: RXPacketCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Camera RX Packet Counter. Total number of packets received from the camera.
Integer.Description: Camera RX Packet Counter. Total number of packets received from the camera.

Integer.Name: DropPacketCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Drop Packet Counter. Number of packets dropped due to corruption.
Integer.Description: Camera Drop Packet Counter. Number of packets dropped due to corruption.

Integer.Name: RXFrameCounter
Integer.ToolTip: RX Frame Counter. Number of received frames from camera.
Integer.Description: RX Frame Counter. Number of received frames from camera.

Integer.Name: DropFrameCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Drop Frame Counter. Number of frames dropped due to corruption.
Integer.Description: Camera Drop Frame Counter. Number of frames dropped due to corruption.

Integer.Name: DropStreamIdCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Drop Stream Id Counter. Number of frames dropped due to StreamId corruption.
Integer.Description: Camera Drop Stream Id Counter. Number of frames dropped due to StreamId corruption.

Integer.Name: OutOfOrderPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Out of Order Packet Counter. Number of packets that were received out of order.
Integer.Description: Camera Out of Order Packet Counter. Number of packets that were received out of order.

Integer.Name: OverflowCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Number of overflow packets.
Integer.Description: Number of overflow packets.

Integer.Name: FifoThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: FIFO threshold, FIFO fill level.
Integer.Description: FIFO threshold, FIFO fill level.

Command.Name: LatencyCountersReset
Command.Description: Reset all Latency related counters.

Integer.Name: LatencyFrameStart
Integer.ToolTip: Latency time in microseconds(us) from frame reception start until user frame acquisition.
Integer.Description: Latency time in microseconds(us) from frame reception start until user frame acquisition.

Integer.Name: LatencyFrameEnd
Integer.ToolTip: Latency time in microseconds(us) from frame reception finish until user frame acquisition.
Integer.Description: Latency time in microseconds(us) from frame reception finish until user frame acquisition.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFps
Float.Description: Actual acquisition frame rate.

StringReg.Name: LinksConnectionMask
StringReg.ToolTip: Links on which camera is detected.
StringReg.Description: Bitmask indicating grabber links on which camera is detected.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.

Enumeration.Name: CxpConnectionTestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Test communication errors of the system cabling between devices.
Enumeration.Description: Test communication errors of the system cabling between devices.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Camera CRC Error Counter. Number of CRC errors generated from corrupted data packets.
Integer.Description: Camera CRC Error Counter. Number of CRC errors generated from corrupted data packets.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestRxPacketCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestTxPacketCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current count for test packets sent to the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current count for test packets sent to the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Integer.Name: TriggerMissedCount
Integer.ToolTip: Missed triggers count, this counter increases if\when a trigger arrives from the user but the system is already busy processing a different trigger.
Integer.Description: Missed triggers count, this counter increases if\when a trigger arrives from the user but the system is already busy processing a different trigger.

Integer.Name: TriggerSentCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sent triggers count, this counter increases if\when a trigger packet is sent from the host IP to remote device.
Integer.Description: Sent triggers count, this counter increases if\when a trigger packet is sent from the host IP to remote device.

Integer.Name: TriggerAcknowledgeCount
Integer.ToolTip: Acknowledgement triggers count, this counter increases if\when an acknowledge arrives from the remote device to the host, for a trigger sent from the host to the remote device.
Integer.Description: Acknowledgement triggers count, this counter increases if\when an acknowledge arrives from the remote device to the host, for a trigger sent from the host to the remote device.

Integer.Name: TriggerChangeCount
Integer.ToolTip: In change triggers count, this counter increases if\when the user give a trigger to the host.
Integer.Description: In change triggers count, this counter increases if\when the user give a trigger to the host.

Integer.Name: ConnectionChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the connection channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the connection channel to control.

Command.Name: ConnectionStatisticsReset
Command.Description: Reset all connection counters.

Integer.Name: ConnectionRevisionPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Revision packets.
Integer.Description: Number of Revision packets.

Integer.Name: ConnectionCommandPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Command packets.
Integer.Description: Number of Command packets.

Integer.Name: ConnectionFECRxPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Received packets by FEC.
Integer.Description: Received packets by FEC .

Integer.Name: ConnectionFECCorrectedPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of corrected packets by FEC.
Integer.Description: Number of corrected packets by FEC.

Integer.Name: ConnectionFECCorruptedPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Number of uncorrectable packets.
Integer.Description: Number of uncorrectable packets.

Enumeration.Name: PCS_TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: PCS Test Mode.
Enumeration.Description: PCS Test Mode.

Enumeration.Name: XGMII_TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: XGMII Test Mode.

Integer.ToolTip: XGMII tester transmitted packets.
Integer.Description: XGMII tester transmitted packets.

Integer.Name: XGMIITester_RXPackets
Integer.ToolTip: XGMII tester received packets.
Integer.Description: XGMII tester received packets.

Integer.Name: XGMIITester_ErrorPackets
Integer.ToolTip: XGMII tester error packets.
Integer.Description: XGMII tester error packets.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionSpeed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Connection speed change.
Enumeration.Description: Connection speed change.

Integer.Name: StreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Command.Name: StreamStatisticsReset
Command.Description: Reset all stream statistics counters.

Integer.Name: StreamRxPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Stream RX Packet Counter. Total number of packets received from the camera.
Integer.Description: Stream RX Packet Counter. Total number of packets received from the camera.

Integer.Name: StreamDropPackets
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Drop Packet Counter. Number of packets dropped due to corruption.
Integer.Description: Camera Drop Packet Counter. Number of packets dropped due to corruption.

Integer.Name: StreamRxFrames
Integer.ToolTip: RX Frame Counter. Number of received frames from camera.
Integer.Description: RX Frame Counter. Number of received frames from camera.

Integer.Name: StreamDropFrames
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Drop Frame Counter. Number of frames dropped due to corruption.
Integer.Description: Camera Drop Frame Counter. Number of frames dropped due to corruption.

Enumeration.Name: PixelIFTransformEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Pixel Format Transform Enable Mask.
Enumeration.Description: Pixel Format Transform Enable Mask.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Pixel Format for Image Format transformation.
Enumeration.Description: Pixel Format for Image Format transformation. Availability is subject to current camera's pixel format.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image, to override the one provided by the remote device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image, to override the one provided by the remote device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image, to override the one provided by the remote device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image, to override the one provided by the remote device (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: DebayerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bayer demosaic algorithm.
Enumeration.Description: Bayer demosaic algorithm.

Integer.Name: SegmentsPerBuffer
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Lines/Frames to accumulate in a single buffer frame.
Integer.Description: Number of Lines/Frames to accumulate in a single buffer frame.

Integer.Name: FramesPerStream
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to allocate for stream's memory buffer (max. 65535).
Integer.Description: Number of frames to allocate for stream's memory buffer (max. 65535).

Enumeration.Name: PackedDataMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select maintain data packing mode for stream output.
Enumeration.Description: Select maintain data packing mode for stream output.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
Enumeration.Description: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.

Boolean.Name: XRGB8888
Boolean.ToolTip: Inserts a byte of padding for each 3 bytes of data.
Boolean.Description: Inserts a byte of padding for each 3 bytes of data.

Enumeration.Name: Deinterlacing
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates whether received picture should be deinterlaced.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates whether received picture should be deinterlaced.

Enumeration.Name: TransferControlMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the control method for the transfers for the remote device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the control method for the transfers for the remote device.

Command.Name: PolledParametersInvalidator
Command.ToolTip: Inalidates the value of appointed parameters.
Command.Description: Inalidates the value of appointed parameters. Triggered by background monitoring procedure

Category.Name: BandwidthTest
Category.ToolTip: Parameters of bandwidthTest.
Category.Description: Parameters of bandwidthTest..

Float.Name: PWM_frequency
Float.ToolTip: Fan control clock frequency in KHz.
Float.Description: Fan control clock frequency in KHz.

Float.Name: PWM_period
Float.ToolTip: Fan control clock period in microseconds(us).
Float.Description: Fan control clock period in microseconds(us).

Integer.Name: PWM_period_raw
Integer.ToolTip: RAW value of PWM_period register.
Integer.Description: RAW value of PWM_period register.

Integer.Name: PWM_duty_cycle
Integer.ToolTip: Fan duty cycle in percentage to PWM period.
Integer.Description: Fan duty cycle in percentage to PWM period.

Integer.Name: PWM_duty_cycle_raw
Integer.ToolTip: Fan active PWM_duty_cycle raw value.
Integer.Description: Fan active PWM_duty_cycle raw value.

Float.Name: PWM_max_temp
Float.Description: When the card's temperature rise above the max threshold it will turn the fan on.

Integer.Name: PWM_max_temp_raw
Integer.ToolTip: RAW value of PWM_max_temp register.
Integer.Description: RAW value of PWM_max_temp register.

Float.Name: PWM_min_temp
Float.Description: When the card's temperature drop below the min threshold it will turn the fan Off.

Integer.Name: PWM_min_temp_raw
Integer.ToolTip: RAW value of PWM_min_temp register.
Integer.Description: RAW value of PWM_min_temp register.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.Description: Reset the device.

Command.Name: DeviceStreamControlReset
Command.Description: Reset the device's stream control.

Integer.Name: CameraDiscoveryDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Delay in miliseconds(ms) before camera discovery.
Integer.Description: Delay in miliseconds(ms) before camera discovery.

Integer.Name: CameraDiscoveryLinkMask
Integer.ToolTip: Non zero value will be used as bitmask to define grabber links participating in for camera detection. If left 0 then all links will be used.
Integer.Description: Non zero value will be used as bitmask to define grabber links participating in for camera detection. If left 0 then all links will be used..

Float.Name: DeviceLinkCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of all links in microseconds(us). This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of all links in microseconds(us). This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which link to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which link to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the logical link.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevGVCPPort
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the GVCP port number for the given logical link.
Integer.Description: Reports the GVCP port number for the given logical link.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP0
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 0 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 0 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP1
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 1 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 1 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP2
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 2 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 2 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP3
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 3 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 3 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP4
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 4 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 4 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP5
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 5 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 5 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP6
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 6 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 6 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXP7
Enumeration.ToolTip: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 7 control.
Enumeration.Description: Frame grabber PoCXP channel 7 control.

Enumeration.Name: PoCXPAutoAvailable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates whether PoCXP can be controlled automatically.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates whether PoCXP can be controlled automatically.

Enumeration.Name: SilentDiscovery
Enumeration.ToolTip: Silent camera detection mode. This will not send commands to the camera in the discovery process, but try to synchronize on previously established connection.
Enumeration.Description: Silent camera detection mode. This will not send commands to the camera in the discovery process, but try to synchronize on previously established connection.

Integer.Name: Timestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter in nanoseconds
Integer.Description: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter in nanoseconds

Command.Name: TimestampReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Command.Description: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Command.Name: TimestampLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into Timestamp Latch Value.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into Timestamp Latch Value.

Integer.Name: TimestampLatchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the latched value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds
Integer.Description: Reports the latched value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds

Integer.Name: MacomChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Macom channel.
Integer.Description: Macom channel.

Integer.Name: MacomAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Macom Address
Integer.Description: Macom Address

Integer.Name: MacomValue
Integer.ToolTip: Macom Value
Integer.Description: Macom Value

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferPostChunkSleep
Integer.ToolTip: Delay after transmitting a chunk (us), max 4095
Integer.Description: Delay after transmitting a chunk (us), max 4095

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferChunkMax
Integer.ToolTip: Transmit chunk size limit, max 1023
Integer.Description: Transmit chunk size limit, max 1023

Enumeration.Name: CxpRemoteTransferTags
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transmit CXP2 tags. Tag is increased by one each time. Setting 'Reset and Force On' resets next tag to 0
Enumeration.Description: Transmit CXP2 tags. Tag is increased by one each time. Setting 'Reset and Force On' resets next tag to 0

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferMaxRetries
Integer.ToolTip: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() retransmits commands if no valid ACK received
Integer.Description: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() retransmits commands if no valid ACK received

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferCmdThrottle
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum number of ms to maintain between CMDs sent on a single channel
Integer.Description: Minimum number of ms to maintain between CMDs sent on a single channel

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferInjectCmdCrcErrors
Integer.ToolTip: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() will inject CRC errors into commands being sent
Integer.Description: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() will inject CRC errors into commands being sent

Integer.Name: CxpRemoteTransferInjectAckCrcErrors
Integer.ToolTip: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() will inject CRC errors into received ACKs
Integer.Description: Number of times RemotePortTransfer() will inject CRC errors into received ACKs

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.

Port.Name: I2CController
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the I2CController(s).
